termTypes.AD: Adjectival form (and other parts of grammar)
termTypes.AQS: Antiquated term, use when there are antiquated synonyms within a concept
termTypes.BR: US brand name, which may be trademarked
termTypes.FB: Foreign brand name, which may be trademarked
termTypes.HD: *Header (groups concepts, but not used for coding data)
